document_data.name: Arcanum of Magic
document_data.mainbody: The '''Arcanum of Magic''', also known as the '''Great University''', was a prominent university and temple dedicated to [[Thoth]], a common combination among Thothian temples.
document_data.Location: The Arcanum was located in the northern part of [[Gheldaneth]], adjacent to a [[Wizard's college (Gheldaneth)|wizard's college]] available only to Thoth's clergy.
document_data.Structure: The Arcanum was the largest building in all of Gheldaneth,
document_data.Activities: This university taught students of various ages how to count, read, and write. It also taught basic information on the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]] and the history of Mulhorand.
document_data.Inhabitants:
Operation of the Arcanum was conducted by the [[Scribes' Guild]].

Attending the Arcanum was compulsory for all citizens of Gheldaneth, even slaves. This occurred frequently during childhood and adults annually came to be retested. The most exemplary of students received invitations to join the Scribes' Guild. In addition to students, the Arcanum was home to a secret order of Thoth worshiping [[archivist]]s known as the [[Order of Ibis]], which was founded following an excavation of a forgotten complex beneath the university.<ref>{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Archivists and Dread Necromancers}}
